title: New: CLAY – Follow Me Down
content:
Clay’s ambitious two-part debut single marked her out as a colossal talent, and her follow up, Follow Me Down, comes through on the early promise. More conventionally pop, there’s still a slightly off-kilter edge to it – which allows it to remain brim full of personality. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
